Level 4 Abjuration Spell

Protect a creature from death. The next time damage would reduce it to 0 hit points, it remains conscious with 1 hit point left.

Death Ward is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Death Ward is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Death Ward Information

Description: Protect a creature from death. The next time damage would reduce it to 0 hit points, it remains conscious with 1 hit point left. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Abjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 1.5m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

Death Ward Tips & Notes

For any non-summon spell that lasts until Long Rest, the caster does not need to be in your party once you leave camp as long as the spell does not require concentration. Therefore, you can easily cast this spell on any party members you plan to use while leaving the caster back in camp. If the caster of this spell removes it from their prepared spells list, the spell's effect will end immediately.
